text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Several days have passed since<n>Winning Ticket's
realization about<n>how defeat truly feels.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But today she's training as if it were<n>any other day.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ack... This ship's running on fumes...<n>Just about break time
I'd say!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Why would you use all your energy<n>warming up?! I expect
you to train<n>seriously!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One thing, however, is different. She<n>isn't back to her usual,
enthusiastic<n>self.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
By the by, I'm seeing a lot of people<n>with cameras around
the course.<n>What's that about?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Reporters sniffing around for a story<n>no doubt. Today is a
public training<n>day.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ah, now it makes sense! So the<n>public's here to train with
us?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That's not what it means. Whenever<n>a race is approaching,
journalists<n>come to see how our training is<n>coming along.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
And today is public day for the Derby.<n>So there are even
more reporters than<n>usual it seems.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, that was today?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
This is a good chance to see how the<n>other runners are
faring. Let's go<n>check out Hayahide and Taishin.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
This is a good chance to see how the<n>other runners are
faring. Let's go<n>check out Hayahide and Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, right... Okay.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The Derby runners all gather to start<n>practicing in public
view.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
There's the BNW trio. Narita Taishin<n>won the Satsuki Sho—all
eyes'll be on<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Biwa Hayahide isn't one to sneeze at<n>either. And she's
only going to get<n>better from here.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just as the reporters predicted, Narita<n>Taishin and Biwa
Hayahide's running<n>sends murmurs through the crowd.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: All right, next is Winning Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No matter how much they wait<n>though, Winning Ticket
doesn't come<n>out. I start feeling anxious that<n>something
might've happened to her.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer, you seen Ticket?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: No... I thought she headed for public<n>training with you two.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: No... I thought she headed for public<n>training with you two.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
She didn't. And she wasn't near the<n>starting line when it
was her turn to<n>run.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hm, if you don't know...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: No... She wouldn't!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: H-hey! Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Taishin and Hayahide leave the<n>scene in a hurry. They
must've<n>realized something and gone to chase<n>after
Winning Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I don't have a hope of catching up<n>with two Umamusume,
but I go looking<n>for them anyway.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ticket! What're you doing?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I head in the direction of Narita<n>Taishin's voice and find her
with Biwa<n>Hayahide and Winning Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: This is public training for theDERBY! And you're not running?! What're you hiding from?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sorry... I didn't mean to hide from<n>anyone.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But my legs... They just won't budge.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You... don't mean you're injured, I<n>take it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm scared... What if I can't keep up<n>with everyone in public
training? I...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
So that's what's been on your mind<n>since you lost the
Satsuki Sho?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: To hell with that!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
You lost your nerve after a single<n>defeat?! What happened
to your<n>gotta-win attitude?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I've lost tons of times. And I was<n>freaked out when I saw I
couldn't cut<n>it!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
But still... I faced my fears and<n>worked my butt off! 'Cause I
wasn't<n>gonna break our promise!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ugh, forget it! This sucks!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You're not the only one who's<n>scared you know. I continue
on in<n>spite of my fear.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
There's nothing more for us to say.<n>It's up to you to clear
your head.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The speechless racer watches on as<n>her friends depart.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: To be honest, I didn't realize it'd be<n>this scary...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You only get one shot at the Derby...<n>There's no next time...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I sit in the trainers' office that night,<n>thinking about Winning
Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her dream was born from seeing the<n>Derby up close as a
kid.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And chasing that dream, she entered<n>the academy full of
hope and trained<n>day after day.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's always run toward her goal<n>without looking back, her
desire to win<n>the Derby stronger than anyone<n>else's.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And now that she's tasted defeat,<n>she's scared that her
dream might be<n>crushed.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I'm reflecting on this, I notice<n>Ticket's Derby notebook
on the desk<n>and pick it up.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Right there under the photo stickers of<n>the three friends who
are chasing the<n>Derby together...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's a message. "I can do it! Only<n>a little more until I
become a Derby<n>champion!"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her words from when she held her<n>dream tight, before
failure entered her<n>mind.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I want her to win. I want her to<n>achieve her dream...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Helping her realize her potential is<n>what a trainer's
supposed to do.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I won't fail her. I'll make sure the<n>next entry in her
notebook says,<n>"Derby champion Winning Ticket and<n>her
Derby trainer!"
